text: Sienna Shaw is a fictional character in the Terrifier franchise who has been called the "final girl" of the franchise. Sienna first appears in Terrifier 2 (2022) as a teenager who likes cosplay and fights the clown-like serial killer Art the Clown. She is played by Lauren LaVera. Collider calls Sienna as the Wonder Woman of horror movies and that she breaks from the final girl trope because of her resurrection after death. ==References== Category:Horror movie characters Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional orphans
title: Sienna Shaw
